title: Filled With Warmth!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Emma, what are you gonna get?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hmm, I think I might get black tea...... Oh, but this pear juice also looks good. There’s jelly in it! I can’t decide~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It seems you don’t know what you should really be getting from a vending machine at this time of year......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>When it starts getting cold, you get this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Miso soup......? In a can?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It’ll warm your body right up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah, if I were to get a warm drink, I would get corn soup or hot cocoa...... You disagree?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Those aren’t bad, but once you take a sip of the miso soup, it’ll change what you think. It’ll change your understanding of what it means to be filled with warmth! Wanna try it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>O-Okay! I accept the challenge!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
